It is characterized by its distinctive foliage, which features leaves that grow predominantly on one side of the stem, giving it a striking asymmetrical appearance. The plant belongs to the family Poaceae, commonly known as the grass family, and exhibits a compact growth habit with dense, mat-like foliage.
